name: Post Embeds – Customize your WordPress post embeds
author: Valentin Garcia

sections.description:
Post Embeds plugin makes easy to customize your WordPress post embeds. You can make your post embeds use a similar design to Twitter and Facebook with just a few of clicks.

Customizing posts embeds has never been easier! Want to display the author but not the date and time? Post Embeds makes this process very simple.

Main features

  • Support for post and pages
  • Support for WooCommerce products – Pro only
  • Apply the customizations by post type
  • 3 design styles available. More to come!
  • Display options for date and time
  • Display options for read more link
  • Display options for author
  • Display author avatar – New!

Pro

Post Embeds Pro add support to WooCommerce products.

Need help?

Before asking for support, please be sure to read our documentation. Maybe the answer to your question is there. If still you need help, post in our WordPress support forum. Please note since this is a free plugin created and maintained by a single person, the help will be provided depending on my free time.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0 – 08 Apr, 2024

  • ADDED: Added gravatar support

1.0.1 – 03 Apr, 2024

  • CHANGED: Prefix for constants, settings, class, hooks and methods
  • ADDED: Check if Pro is installed

1.0.0 – 28 Dec, 2022

  • First version
